paper_title.ja: TPPと国民主権
所得分配構造の変化と租税負担―消費税ｖｓ法人税
paper_title.en: Changing Income Distribution and Tax: Sales Tax and Corporate Tax

description.ja: 応能負担原則の立場からすれば、消費税ではなく法人税引き上げが求められる。なぜなら、1990年代末以降、労働から資本へ、中小企業から大手企業への所得分配シフトが進み、また、大手企業では手元資金の対投資比率が高まり、財テク化が進むからである。

paper_title.ja: 書評：一井昭編著「グローバル資本主義の構造分析」
WTO Regime as a New Stage of Imperialism: Decaying Stage of Capitalism
paper_title.en: WTO Regime as a New Stage of Imperialism: Decaying Stage of Capitalism

description.ja: Big business corporations as monopoly capital control more than half of the world market share in major industries. In addition, with the establishment of the WTO (World Trade Organization) monopoly capital won governance over "trade rules." This ushered in a new era of corporate globalization. First, corporate globalization is characterized as a new stage of imperialism. Second, it can be characterized as a decaying capitalism. It does not secure a stable and sustainable life; on the contrary, it destroys it, because economic and political power, and therefore income, is concentrated in the monopoly capital. Therefore, for the people to realize a sustainable and stable community life, the corporate globalization regime must be abolished and the community must regain its governing power. This is a new strategy called localization, which is an alternative to the corporate globalization.
